heading: Today
text: A few breaks of morning sun south, then mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers north, south through the mountains, most frequently in the Adirondacks and northern Greens. Blustery and cold. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s north, and low to mid 30s south. West winds increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers in the north and mountains ending, then partial clearing. More clouds late. Lows in the 20s, near 20 over the higher terrain north. Winds southwest near 10 mph, becoming light in sheltered valleys east, increasing to 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph west of the Green Mountains.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. A good chance of snow showers across the higher terrain north, scattered in northern valleys and southern mountains. Cold. Highs in the 30s north, near 40 in the Champlain Valley and south. Southwest winds increasing to 10 to 15 mph from the Green Mountains west, gusting to 25 mph, less than 10 mph east.
